00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32F5XXXX_WDT_H
00030 #define __HT32F5XXXX_WDT_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /** @addtogroup WDT
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 
00047 
00048 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup WDT_Exported_Constants WDT exported constants
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /* WDT prescaler                                                                                            */
00054 #define WDT_PRESCALER_1                           ((u16)0x0000)
00055 #define WDT_PRESCALER_2                           ((u16)0x1000)
00056 #define WDT_PRESCALER_4                           ((u16)0x2000)
00057 #define WDT_PRESCALER_8                           ((u16)0x3000)
00058 #define WDT_PRESCALER_16                          ((u16)0x4000)
00059 #define WDT_PRESCALER_32                          ((u16)0x5000)
00060 #define WDT_PRESCALER_64                          ((u16)0x6000)
00061 #define WDT_PRESCALER_128                         ((u16)0x7000)
00062 
00063 #define IS_WDT_PRESCALER(PRESCALER)               ((PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_1) || \
00064                                                    (PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_2) || \
00065                                                    (PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_4) || \
00066                                                    (PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_8) || \
00067                                                    (PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_16) || \
00068                                                    (PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_32) || \
00069                                                    (PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_64) || \
00070                                                    (PRESCALER == WDT_PRESCALER_128))
00071 
00072 
00073 /* WDT runs or halts in sleep and deep sleep1 mode                                                          */
00074 /* WDT WDTSHLT mask                                                                                         */
00075 #define MODE0_WDTSHLT_BOTH                        ((u32)0x00000000)
00076 #define MODE0_WDTSHLT_SLEEP                       ((u32)0x00004000)
00077 #define MODE0_WDTSHLT_HALT                        ((u32)0x00008000)
00078 
00079 #define IS_WDT_WDTSHLT_MODE(WDT_Mode)             ((WDT_Mode == MODE0_WDTSHLT_BOTH) || \
00080                                                    (WDT_Mode == MODE0_WDTSHLT_SLEEP) || \
00081                                                    (WDT_Mode == MODE0_WDTSHLT_HALT))
00082 
00083 
00084 
00085 /* WDT Flag                                                                                                 */
00086 #define WDT_FLAG_UNDERFLOW                        ((u32)0x00000001)
00087 #define WDT_FLAG_ERROR                            ((u32)0x00000002)
00088 
00089 
00090 #define IS_WDT_FLAG(WDT_FLAG)                     ((WDT_FLAG == WDT_FLAG_UNDERFLOW) || \
00091                                                    (WDT_FLAG == WDT_FLAG_ERROR))
00092 
00093 
00094 #define IS_WDT_RELOAD(WDTV)                       ((WDTV <= 0xFFF))
00095 
00096 #define IS_WDT_DELTA(WDTD)                        ((WDTD <= 0xFFF))
00097 
00098 #if (LIBCFG_LSE)
00099 /* WDT Source Select                                                                                        */
00100 #define WDT_SOURCE_LSI                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00101 #define WDT_SOURCE_LSE                            ((u32)0x00000001)
00102 
00103 
00104 #define IS_WDT_SOURCE_SELECT(WDT_SOURCE)          ((WDT_SOURCE == WDT_SOURCE_LSI) || \
00105                                                    (WDT_SOURCE == WDT_SOURCE_LSE))
00106 #endif
00107 /**
00108   * @}
00109   */
00110 
00111 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00112 /** @defgroup WDT_Exported_Functions WDT exported functions
00113   * @{
00114   */
00115 void WDT_DeInit(void);
00116 void WDT_Cmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00117 void WDT_HaltConfig(u32 WDT_Mode);
00118 void WDT_ResetCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00119 void WDT_ProtectCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00120 void WDT_SetReloadValue(u16 WDTV);
00121 u16 WDT_GetReloadValue(void);
00122 void WDT_SetDeltaValue(u16 WDTD);
00123 u16 WDT_GetDeltaValue(void);
00124 void WDT_SetPrescaler(u16 WDT_PRESCALER);
00125 u8 WDT_GetPrescaler(void);
00126 void WDT_Restart(void);
00127 FlagStatus WDT_GetFlagStatus (u32 WDT_FLAG);
00128 void WDT_LockCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00129 #if (LIBCFG_LSE)
00130 void WDT_SourceConfig(u32 WDT_SOURCE);
00131 #endif

00133   * @}
00134   */
